results.description: Aberdeen make it three wins from three despite the loss of an early goal against Ross County. (UK only)
results.title: Highlights: Ross County 1-3 Aberdeen

results.description: Aberdeen make it three wins from three as they move up to third in the Scottish Premiership by beating Ross County at the Global Energy Stadium.
results.shortTitle: Aberdeen beat Ross County to move third
results.title: Ross County 1-3 Aberdeen

thumbnail.altText: Aberdeen's Niall McGinn and Michael Devlin

results.description: Ross County co-manager Steven Ferguson says his promoted side's "honeymoon period is over" after facing every team in the Scottish Premiership.
results.title: Ross County: 'Honeymoon period is over' - Steven Ferguson

results.description: Brian Graham's late goal ensures Hamilton Academical and Ross County have to share the points. (UK only)
results.title: Highlights: Hamilton Academical 2-2 Ross County

results.description: Hamilton Academical head coach Brian Rice believes his side deserved all three points against Ross County after they conceded late to draw 2-2.
results.shortTitle: Watch: 'Total injustice' Hamilton didn't win - Rice
results.title: Brian Rice: 'Total injustice' Hamilton didn't beat Ross County

results.description: Ross County edge into the top six of the Scottish Premiership after Brian Graham's late strike rescued a draw against Hamilton Academical.
results.title: Hamilton Acad 2-2 Ross County: Visitors rescue late draw

thumbnail.altText: Brian Graham celebrates his late equaliser

results.description: Alfredo Morelos and Ryan Jack each score twice in a one-sided victory as Rangers keep pace with Scottish Premiership leaders Celtic.
results.title: Highlights: Ross County 0-4 Rangers

results.description: Alfredo Morelos and Ryan Jack both score doubles in a one-sided win for Rangers, who keep pace with Premiership leaders Celtic.
results.title: Highlights: Ross County 0-4 Rangers

results.description: Braces from Ryan Jack and Alfredo Morelos help Rangers ease to victory against Ross County and keep pace with Celtic at the top of the Scottish Premiership.
results.shortTitle: Jack and Morelos help Rangers thrash County
results.title: Ross County 0-4 Rangers: Jack double gives visitors easy win

results.description: Brian Graham scores a cracker then misses a sitter as Ross County come from two behind to draw 2-2 with the striker's former side, Hibernian. (UK only)

results.description: Ross County roar back from two goals down to hold Hibernian and deny the hosts a first Scottish Premiership win since the opening day of the season.
